description: Here is a glimpse into the ultra-privileged lives of Singapore's Chinese residents. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Wealthy Chinese nationals in Singapore: Tales of rags to riches and hard work
title_page: Wealthy Chinese nationals in Singapore: Tales of rags to riches and hard work | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Bentley cars, Patek Philippe timepieces, good class bungalows and collectible Bearbricks with price tags reaching into the thousands.
What is now known as Singapore’s worst money laundering case, involving more than $2.4 billion of assets, has offered a tantalising glimpse into the opulent lifestyles of Singapore’s elite Chinese residents.
